articles.author: Daniel Sims
articles.title: Google is turning any headphones into real-time translation earbuds - TechSpot
articles.description: Starting today, Android device owners can begin testing live speech translation in the Google Translate app, which now relies on Gemini. The AI makes text translations sound...
articles.content: Looking ahead: Live translation is shaping up to be one of the most practical (and competitive) uses of generative AI, with real-life implications for how people communicate across languages. A new u… [+2684 chars]
